ul.li: Include codes fromurn:iso:std:iso:3166 where code matches (by regex) [A-Z]{3}

Include these codes as defined in http://id.who.int/icd/release/11/mms
CodeDisplayDefinition
1A07TyphoidTyphoid
1E32InfluenzaInfluenza
1F03MeaslesMeasles
1C12PertussisPertussis
1D80MumpsMumps
1E90VaricellaVaricella
1E50.0Viral hepatitis AViral hepatitis A
1B1ZTuberculosisTuberculosis
1E50.1Viral hepatitis BViral hepatitis B
XN0FGHaemophilus influenzae type bHaemophilus influenzae type b
1C13TetanusTetanus
XN6N7RotavirusRotavirus
XN8JYHuman papillomavirusHuman papillomavirus
1C85Japanese encephalitisJapanese encephalitis
1C81PoliomyelitisPoliomyelitis
1C17DiphtheriaDiphtheria
CA40.07Pneumococcal diseasePneumococcal disease
1F02RubellaRubella
1D2ZDengueDengue
1C82RabiesRabies
1C1CMeningococcalMeningococcal
1A00CholeraCholera
1C80Tick-borne encephalitisTick-borne encephalitis
1D47Yellow feverYellow fever
RA01COVID-19COVID-19

Include these codes as defined in http://id.who.int/icd/release/11/mms

XM8AW3Diphtheria vaccinesDiphtheria vaccines

XM31Q8Tetanus, diphtheria, acellular pertussisTetanus, diphtheria, acellular pertussis

XM09Q7Diphtheria, pertussis, poliomyelitis, tetanus vaccinesDiphtheria, pertussis, poliomyelitis, tetanus vaccines
